title: Mini-Ep 196: Going The Distance
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 196: Going The Distance
itunes:subtitle: Kate feels oh-so-good about briefly visiting a Sephora in person and Doree needs some post-lockdown fashion inspo. Then listeners send in their tips for surviving long-distance relationships and share how they’re navigating fashion and style right now....
description:
Kate feels oh-so-good about briefly visiting a Sephora in person and Doree needs some post-lockdown fashion inspo. Then listeners send in their tips for surviving long-distance relationships and share how they’re navigating fashion and style right now.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
  • Sign up for the newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter!


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

STRIVECTIN - Learn more at StriVectin.com. Email subscribers receive 15% off their first order.

AURA FRAMES - Go to auraframes.com and used code forever35 for up to $100 until May 9th!

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

PURPLE - Go to Purple.com/forever3510, and use promo code FOREVER3510. For a limited time, get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

JENNI KAYNE - Get 15% off your first order at jennikayne.com when you use code FOREVER35 at checkout.

ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
